function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on potential over credentials in hiring process could lead to increased risk of contagious diseases in the workplace if health status is not properly assessed.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases among employees and potential impact on business operations and public health.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health screening measures for all employees, including regular testing and health check-ups.","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, testing kits, and contact tracing tools.","People":"Employees, job applicants","Owner":"HR department, management"},{"Description":"Emphasis on sustainable development and conservation in partnerships may lead to increased risk of exposure to zoonotic diseases or environmental hazards.","Impact":"Potential risk of contracting zoonotic diseases or exposure to environmental hazards during conservation and sustainable development activities.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict safety protocols and training for employees involved in conservation and sustainable development projects. Implement regular health check-ups and provide protective gear.","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technology, personal protective equipment (PPE), and hazard detection systems.","People":"Partners, employees engaged in conservation activities","Owner":"Health and safety department, project managers"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for human health and well-being in favor of economic recovery may lead to increased risk of public health crises, including contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential public health crises and increased risk of contagious diseases due to neglect of human health and well-being in economic decision-making.","Mitigation":"Promote policies and initiatives that prioritize public health and well-being, invest in healthcare infrastructure, and ensure access to essential healthcare services.","Technologies":"Healthcare delivery systems, telemedicine platforms, and public health monitoring tools.","People":"General public, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, government"}]}
